save_pdf.description: Save a report to a PDF file.

example.code:
# Use this method to save a report to "myreport.pdf" file:
ds.save_report_to_pdf("myreport.pdf")

clear_stack.description: Clear the reporting stack. Defaults to True.

save_html.description: Save a report to multiple HTML files, one per stacked item.

example.code:
# Use this method to save a report to multiple HTML files, with info printed
# about the headers:
ds.save_report_to_html_files(info=True)

info.description: Print info about the HTML headers. Defaults to False.

clear_stack.description: Clear the reporting stack. Defaults to True.
